quality_assessment: Page documents the WRONG workflow system - covers mdbook/book workflow instead of MkDocs workflow. Additionally, CLI commands are outdated.

issues.description: Page documents the mdbook/book-docs-drift.yml workflow instead of the mkdocs-drift.yml workflow. This section is for MkDocs Material documentation (docs/) not mdbook documentation (book/src/). All file paths, commands, and examples reference the wrong workflow system.
issues.fix_suggestion: Rewrite the entire document to reference the MkDocs workflow system instead of the mdbook system. Update all paths from book/src/ to docs/, from .prodigy/book-analysis/ to .prodigy/mkdocs-analysis/, and from book-docs-drift.yml to mkdocs-drift.yml.

issues.description: Documentation uses 'prodigy dlq show <job_id>' which does not exist. The actual CLI commands are 'prodigy dlq list' for listing items and 'prodigy dlq inspect <item_id>' for inspecting individual items.
issues.should_be: prodigy dlq list --job-id <job_id> for listing, prodigy dlq inspect <item_id> --job-id <job_id> for details
issues.fix_suggestion: Replace all instances of 'prodigy dlq show' with the correct CLI commands: 'prodigy dlq list' for listing and 'prodigy dlq inspect' for inspection.

issues.description: Documentation references 'prodigy events <job_id>' but the actual command is 'prodigy events ls --job-id <job_id>'.
issues.fix_suggestion: Update all event command examples to use the correct subcommand syntax.

issues.description: The examples show testing /prodigy-analyze-subsection-drift and /prodigy-fix-subsection-drift commands with book/src/ paths, but MkDocs documentation uses /prodigy-analyze-mkdocs-drift and /prodigy-fix-mkdocs-drift commands with docs/ paths.
issues.fix_suggestion: Update command examples to use MkDocs-specific commands and file paths.

issues.description: The file locations table references .prodigy/book-analysis/, .prodigy/book-config.json, and book/ paths which are for mdbook, not MkDocs.
issues.fix_suggestion: Update all file path references to use MkDocs-specific paths.

issues.description: Section references 'mdbook build' but MkDocs uses 'mkdocs build --strict' for building documentation.
issues.current_content: mdbook build fails with broken links, SUMMARY.md sync issues
issues.should_be: mkdocs build --strict fails with validation errors, mkdocs.yml nav structure issues
issues.fix_suggestion: Replace mdbook-specific troubleshooting with mkdocs-specific issues (mkdocs build errors, nav configuration, theme issues).

issues.description: The debugging section is thorough for the book workflow but needs MkDocs-specific debugging techniques like checking mkdocs.yml validation, material theme configuration, and nav structure.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add MkDocs Material-specific debugging: mkdocs serve for local preview, mkdocs.yml validation, material theme settings, and navigation structure debugging.

issues.description: Missing troubleshooting for MkDocs-specific issues like: Material theme configuration problems, navigation structure validation, admonition/tab rendering issues, and mermaid diagram failures.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add sections for MkDocs Material-specific issues: theme configuration, nav validation, material extensions (admonitions, tabs, code annotations), and mermaid integration.

positive_aspects: Good use of symptoms/causes/solution format for each issue
Comprehensive coverage of DLQ and event debugging concepts
Helpful FAQ section addressing common questions
Clear file locations reference table format
Source references provided for each section
improvement_suggestions: Completely rewrite to document MkDocs workflow instead of mdbook workflow
Update all CLI command examples to match actual implementation
Add MkDocs Material-specific troubleshooting (theme, navigation, extensions)
Add admonitions and code annotations per MkDocs Material best practices
Consider adding a comparison section if both workflow types need documentation

metadata.validation_focus: Auto-discovered page - check for drift and enhance with visual features
